channel.title: Mandrith | 317 | BRAND NEW| FRESH START | UNIQUE BASE & CONTENT | MUCH MORE
channel.description:
[center]Hi there, I'd like to invite everyone to a special opening event, which will happen pretty soon. The whole idea is to build a player demand before the server starts, so there will be some fair competition for the scores and it's fun in overall when everyone starts from scratch. [/center] [center][url=http://mandrith.com/?r=m]----------> [b]Website <----------[/b][/url][/center] [center]Some information: PvP combat is using the exact OSRS combat formulas (accuracy, max hit) Server is running on NIO networking, giving you fast and smooth gameplay Most of the bosses (not custom ones) use the same mechanics as on RS Reputation system ingame Gambling, staking 2 currencies: Blood money and coins XP choices [/center] [center]This server is a project, it has a lot of time put in building the source and now it's time to let the players in. Over the time there will be bunch of unique content added and there are big plans for the server's future. Here are some of the media what it can offer you now:[/center] [center] [img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img2.png[/img] [b]The xp modes[/b]
[b]Playing on extreme makes your rare drops roll chance to decrease by 30%, for instance if the drop is 1 in 100, playing as extreme will make it 1 in 70. Playing on master decreases drop roll by 10%. In addition, playing on extreme makes your prayer drain way slower. [/b]
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img1.png[/img]
[b]This is a sneak peak of custom built home[/b] ;)
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img3.png[/img]
[b]World event - a gold node spawning in the wilderness from time to time, providing players with money.[/b]
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img4.png[/img]
[b]One of the unique bosses, with special combat mechanics and good drops to offer.[/b]
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img8.png[/img]
[b]Fully functional skills, however not all! Some still need to be finished and to improved![/b]
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img6.png[/img]
[b]Ingame built in reputation system! ::rep name, ::neg name[/b]
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img9.png[/img]
[b]With enough reputation you get access to gambling items[/b]
[img]http://mandrith.com/media/img/img10.png[/img]
[b]PvP has a blood money currency which can be exchanged for items![/b]
There's a lot more content show, but instead you should go see it yourself! (once it's out) ;) [/center]

item.title: Mandrith | 317 | BRAND NEW| FRESH START | UNIQUE BASE & CONTENT | MUCH MORE
item.dc:creator: @TrueEpic TrueEpic
item.description:
@TrueEpic wrote:

[center]Hi there, I’d like to invite everyone to a special opening event, which will happen pretty soon. The whole idea is to build a player demand before the server starts, so there will be some fair competition for the scores and it’s fun in overall when everyone starts from scratch.
[/center]

[center]----------> Website <----------[/center]

[center]Some information:
PvP combat is using the exact OSRS combat formulas (accuracy, max hit)
Server is running on NIO networking, giving you fast and smooth gameplay
Most of the bosses (not custom ones) use the same mechanics as on RS
Reputation system ingame
Gambling, staking
2 currencies: Blood money and coins
XP choices

[/center]

[center]This server is a project, it has a lot of time put in building the source and now it’s time to let the players in. Over the time there will be bunch of unique content added and there are big plans for the server’s future. Here are some of the media what it can offer you now:[/center]

[center]

The xp modes

[b]Playing on extreme makes your rare drops roll chance to decrease by 30%, for instance if the drop is 1 in 100, playing as extreme will make it 1 in 70. Playing on master decreases drop roll by 10%. In addition, playing on extreme makes your prayer drain way slower. [/b]

[b]This is a sneak peak of custom built home[/b] ;)

[b]World event - a gold node spawning in the wilderness from time to time, providing players with money.[/b]

[b]One of the unique bosses, with special combat mechanics and good drops to offer.[/b]

[b]Fully functional skills, however not all! Some still need to be finished and to improved![/b]

[b]Ingame built in reputation system! ::rep name, ::neg name[/b]

[b]With enough reputation you get access to gambling items[/b]

[b]PvP has a blood money currency which can be exchanged for items![/b]

There’s a lot more content show, but instead you should go see it yourself! (once it’s out)

[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Mandrith | 317 | BRAND NEW| FRESH START | UNIQUE BASE & CONTENT | MUCH MORE
